column4: I want my server to route the internet connection gotten through eth1 to eth0, so that I can connect to the net with my home computer, too
how come I can't paste from clipboard in the terminal?
you can. The shortcut is probably different. It's Shift + Insert in Konsole; not sure about Gnome terminal.
check the shortcut. Look in the menus somewhere. Or, you can always just right-click.
